RingbitCar.set_motor_speed: Sets the motor speed. Default is 70 to prevent overheating. This applies to all blocks except steering_angle, freestyle
RingbitCar.steering_angle: Spins the car left or right by the given angle (degrees). Uses its own built-in speed (about 45%); set_motor_speed does not apply.
RingbitCar.running_distance: Drives the car forward or backward for the given distance in cm, then brakes. Uses the current motor speed set by set_motor_speed.
